properties.name: Vol. 5. Plate, Q. [Map bound by Atlantic Basin, Verona St., Columbia St., Otsego St., Partition St., Buttermilk Channel; Including Tremont St., Clinton Wharf, William St., King St., Sullivan St., Bush St., Wolcott St., Dikeman St., South Piers, Ferris St
properties.description: from Detailed estate and old farm line atlas of the city of Brooklyn : complete in six volumes ... from official records, private plans, and actual surveys ... / by G.M. Hopkins, C.E.
